message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but still a decent one. You can't expect to get the same as me!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob.  Let's meet in the middle.  This offer is still fair, considering the inflation.
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give you the majority of the money. You should be grateful for what you're getting!
Bob,  inflation is hurting me. I'm making a big concession here. This is my final offer.  Let's end this.
